channel.title: Weed on Cacaricos's Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Weed on Cacaricos's Mind

item.title: Northern Lights Part 1
item.description: I recently started growing a Northern Lights plant. Initially, it wasn’t doing so well; at almost two months old, it looked like this. I’ve now moved it to a bigger pot and started adding nutrients. In the last week, she’s grown a lot compared to previous weeks.
